ETYMOLOGY: From Middle English ago, agon (past participle of agan 'to go away, pass by'), from Old English āgān (ā- 'away' + gān 'to go').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Used after a period of time to refer to a point in the past before the present.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 以前；...之前（用于时间表达之后，表示从现在算起的一段时间）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: They finished the project three days ago.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他们三天前完成了那个项目。
